about_the_game:
When Cirno discovers a magical item in Gensokyo, her power grows as she freezes all the land! Not satisfied with just Gensokyo, she opens a portal to try and freeze New York in the summer! Join us for this free short kinetic visual novel Touhou adventure! Taking place in New York City, you will encounter various girls, spirits and creatures from the Touhou Universe. This is also our first game featuring our maid mascot, Moka Latte, who takes up a job with a mysterious stranger who just came to town. This game was made for the ⑨ Jam, a special Cirno Touhou game jam!

Gameplay:
* A short word-count makes this a fun quick read
* Beautiful artwork by KeikoKup, Kaoru and Magellan
* Familiar locations in New York City
* Many available save slots
* Ability to skip through the story and fast forward

Story:
David Maiman & Linnea Kataja
Moka Sprites:
Linnea Kataja
3rd Party Sprites:
Kaoru
Magellan

Music by:
Steven (Dong Woo) Yoo
How it Begins
Kevin MacLeod | CC BY
Programming:
David Maiman & Steven (Dong Woo) Yoo
Spanish Translation:
Mari
Producer:
David Maiman

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution built for x86 or x64 processors
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.6+
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or newer
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any OpenGL graphics card capable of running Mac OS X 10.6 or later
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Cirno's Perfect Summer Vacation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
